column3: hwɛ
column4: Nyame nyimpa bi fi Juda nam EWURADZE n’asɛm do baa Bɛtɛl: nna Jeroboam gyina afɔrmbukyia no nkyɛn dɛ ɔrebɛhyew eduhuam."

column2: "Na ɔnam EWURADZE n’asɛm do tseatseaa mu tsiaa afɔrmbukyia no
column3: na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Afɔrmbukyia e
column6: mbrɛ EWURADZE se nye yi oo: Hwɛ
column7: wɔbɔwo ɔba bi ama David fie
column8: ne dzin dze Josia; na wo do na wɔdze mbeambea sorɔnsorɔm do asɔfo a wɔhyew wo do eduhuam bɔbɔ afɔr
column9: na wɔahyew nyimpa mbiew wɔ wo do."

column3: dɛ
column4: iyi nye asɛnkyerɛdze a EWURADZE aka no: Hwɛ
column6: na nso a ɔwɔ do no ehue egu."

column3: aber a ɔhen no tsee Nyame nyimpa no n’asɛm a ɔtseatseaa mu tsiaa afɔrmbukyia no a ɔwɔ Bɛtɛl no
column4: Jeroboam fi afɔrmbukyia no do tseen ne nsa dɛ
column5: Hom nsuo no mu. Na ne nsa no a ɔtseen no wɔ no do no sireen
column6: ma oenntum anntwe no ekyir ammba noho bio."

column3: na nso no huei fi afɔrmbukyia no do gui dɛ mbrɛ asɛnkyerɛdze a Nyame nyimpa no nam EWURADZE n’asɛm do dze mae no tse no."

column2: "Na ɔhen no see Nyame nyimpa no dɛ
column3: Afei serɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn n’adom
column4: na bɔ mpaa ma me
column5: ma me nsa nsan n’ananmu mma me bio. Na Nyame nyimpa no serɛɛ EWURADZE
column6: na ɔhen no ne nsa saan n’ananmu maa no bio
column7: na ɔyɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ nkan no ɔtse no ara."

column2: "Na ɔhen no see Nyame nyimpa no dɛ
column3: Bɛsen nye me nkɔ fie
column4: na kɔdwedwe woho

column2: "Na Nyame nyimpa no see ɔhen no dɛ
column3: Sɛ ebɛma me wo fi fa mpo a
column4: mennkɛnye wo akɔ
column5: nkyii so mirinndzi edziban na eso moronnom nsu wɔ ha yi:"

column2: "na dɛm na ɔnam EWURADZE n’asɛm do wɔdze hyɛɛ me
column3: dɛ
column4: Mma nndzi edziban
column6: nkyii so nnsan mmfa ɔkwan a enam do bae no do."

column3: na ɔannsan ammfa ɔkwan a ɔnam do baa Bɛtɛl no do."

column2: "Afei nkɔnhyɛnyi akɔdaa bi tse Bɛtɛl; na ne mbabanyin no mu baako bae bɛkaa dwuma a Nyame nyimpa no bedzii no wɔ Bɛtɛl da no nyinara kyerɛɛ no: nsɛm a ɔkaa kyerɛɛ ɔhen no
column3: so ɔkaa kyerɛɛ n’egya."
Ɔkwan bɛn do na ɔfae? Afei ne mbabanyin no hun ɔkwan kor a Nyame nyimpa no a ofi Juda bae no dze faa do."
Hom nhyehyɛ asoaso no mma me. Nna wɔhyehyɛɛ asoaso no maa no: na ɔtsenaa do."
na ɔkɔtoo no dɛ ɔtse esudur bi ase: na ɔsee no dɛ
column4: Ana ɔwo nye Nyame nyimpa a ofi Juda bae no? Na ɔsee dɛ

column3: Bɛsen nye me nkɔ fie nkedzidzi."
Murunntum menye wo nnsan
column4: na eso merennye wo nnkɔ: nkyii so mirinndzi edziban na menye wo ronnom nsu so wɔ ha yi:"

column2: "osiandɛ wɔnam EWURADZE n’asɛm do see me dɛ
column3: Mma nndzi edziban na eso nnom nsu wɔ hɔ
column4: na mma nnsan mmfa ɔkwan a enam do bae no do bio."

column3: Emi so nkɔnhyɛnyi nye me dɛ ɔwoara; na ɔbɔfo bi nam EWURADZE n’asɛm do kaa kyerɛɛ me dɛ
column4: Fa no san ma ɔnye wo mbra wo fie
column5: ma ombedzidzi na ɔnnom nsu. Na odzii ator kyerɛɛ no."

column3: na okedzii edziban wɔ ne fie
column4: na ɔnoom nsu."

column3: wɔtse pon ho no
column4: EWURADZE n’asɛm baa nkɔnhyɛnyi no a ɔdze no sanee bae no nkyɛn:"

column2: "na ɔtseatseaa mu kyerɛɛ Nyame nyimpa no a ofi Juda bae no
column3: dɛ
column4: Mbrɛ EWURADZE se nye yi
column5: Susuampa dɛ ɔwo ayɛ asoɔdzen wɔ EWURADZE n’anosɛm ho
column6: na enndzi mbrasɛm a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze hyɛɛ wo no do
column8: "na asan aba ebedzi edziban na anom nsu wɔ beebi mbrɛ ɔsee wo dɛ
column10: na nnom nsu no ntsi; wo fun ronnkɔ w’egyanom hɔn asamandan mu."

column3: odzii edziban
column4: na ɔnomee n’ekyir no
column5: ɔhyehyɛɛ asoaso no maa nkɔnhyɛnyi no a ɔkɛsaan no bae no."

column3: gyata hyiaa no ɔkwan no mu
column4: na okum no: na no fun daa kwan no mu
column5: na asoaso no gyinaa ho; nna gyata no so gyina fun no ho."

column3: hwɛ
column4: nyimpa twaa mu
column5: na wohun fun no a ɔda ɔkwan no mu
column6: na gyata a ogyina fun no ho no: na wɔbaa bɛkaa no wɔ kurow no mu mbrɛ nkɔnhyɛnyi akɔdaa no tse no."

column2: "Na aber a nkɔnhyɛnyi no a ɔdze no sanee fii ɔkwan no do bae no tsee no
column3: ɔsee dɛ
column4: Nyame nyimpa a ɔyɛɛ asoɔdzen wɔ EWURADZE n’anomu asɛm ho no a: dɛm ntsi na EWURADZE eyi no ama gyata no ma ɔatsetsew no ekum no
column5: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE n’asɛm a ɔkaa kyerɛɛ no no tse no."

column2: "Na ɔkaa kyerɛɛ ne mbabanyin no dɛ
column3: Hom nhyehyɛ asoaso no mma me. Na wɔhyehyɛɛ no."

column2: "Na osii mu kɔree na okohun no fun no dɛ ɔda ɔkwan no mu
column3: na asoaso no na gyata no gyinagyina fun no ho; gyata no enndzi fun no
column4: na eso ɔanntsetsew asoaso no mu."

column2: "Na nkɔnhyɛnyi no maa Nyame nyimpa no no fun no do
column3: na ɔdze too asoaso no do
column4: na ɔdze no sanee baa nkɔnhyɛnyi akɔdaa no no kurow no mu
column5: dɛ oribegyam no na oesie no."

column2: "Na akɔdaa no dze fun no too nankasa n’adakamona mu; na ɔnye ne mbabanyin gyaam no dɛ
column3: Ebei
column4: mo nua!"

column3: osiee no n’ekyir no ɔkaa kyerɛɛ ne mbabanyin no dɛ
column4: Sɛ muwu a
column5: ɔno wonsie me wɔ asamandan a woesie Nyame nyimpa no wɔ mu no mu; wɔmfa me mbiew ngu ne mbiew nkyɛn."

column2: "Osiandɛ asɛm a ɔnam EWURADZE n’asɛm do tseatseaa mu tsiaa afɔrmbukyia no wɔ Bɛtɛl na mbeambea sorɔnsorɔm efiefi nyinara a ɔwɔ Samaria nkurow mu no
column3: ɔbɛba mu ampa."

column2: "Asɛm yi ekyir no Jeroboam annsan emmfi no kwan bɔn do
column3: na oyii ɔman no nyinara mu binom yɛɛ hɔn mbeambea sorɔnsorɔm do asɔfo bio: obiara a ɔpɛ no
column4: na ɔatsew no ho
column5: ma ɔaayɛ mbeambea sorɔnsorɔm no do hɔ asɔfo."

column2: "Na asɛm yi bɛyɛɛ bɔn wɔ Jeroboam fie dɛ wobotwa no akyen
column3: na wɔasɛɛ no efi asaase enyi."
